ovdesc.p: Table to list out the transaction codes that are to be used in STMT.ENTRY records for different events.

desc.p: Specifies the transaction code to be used when posting the principal schedules accounting from SL.LOANS application.
Must be an existing TRANSACTION code.
Identifies the Transaction code to be assigned to debit entries generated as a result of Tax Calculations.
Must be a valid TRANSACTION code.
Specifies the transaction code to be used when posting the rolled over loans accounting from SL.ROLLOVER application.
Must be an existing TRANSACTION code.
Transaction code to be used while raising entries for drawdown
Must be a valid record on the TRANSACTION table.
Identifies the Transaction code to be assigned to credit entries generated as a result of Tax Calculations.
Must be an existing TRANSACTION code.
Specifies the transaction code to be used when posting the interest schedule accounting from SL.LOANS application.

Must be a valid TRANSACTION code.

Table to list down the different transaction codes that are to be used while raising STMT.ENTRY records.
The ID of this file is SYSTEM.
The user may commit the table without any input in any of the fields, in which case system would use the default transaction codes.
